alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 4:19PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN SAN MIGUEL... NORTHERN HARDING...WEST CENTRAL UNION AND EAST CENTRAL MORA COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM MDT... At 418 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Gladstone to 8 miles southwest of Mills. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Roy, Mosquero, Bueyeros, Chicosa Lake State Park, Solano, Mills, and Yates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor your preferred media outlets and NOAA Weather Radio for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. Boaters should move to safe shelter now!

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Union County
